cause.description:
International organization contributing to the world antiterror campaign by establishing antiterror intelligence databases, coordinating international antiterror efforts and boosting antiterror cooperation.
1. We believe that freedom is the right of every person.
2. We believe that freedom is the hope of every culture.
3. And we know as International Community that the advance of freedom is the surest path to peace
cause.mission: Protect those who are at threat from Foreign Terrorists.
cause.name: ATU International
